sense.gloss: to argue, to have a heated discussion
to jostle, to crowd, to shake, to rock
to have various experiences (out in the world)

sdata.j: お↑父↑↓とう↓さん、↑肩|↑↓かた↓↑揉↑↓も↓む|よ。
sdata.e: Dad, I will massage your shoulders.

sdata.j: 「↑最近↑↓さいきん↓、お↑疲↑↓つか↓れのようですが、↑何↑↓なに↓かあったんですか？」「あっ、↑年頃↑↓としごろ↓になってきた↑娘↑↓むすめ↓のことで、あれこれと↑気↑↓き↓を|↑揉↑↓も↓む|ことが↑多↑↓おお↓くてね」
sdata.e: You seem tired lately, is everything all right? "Oh, it's my daughter. She's become all grown up and I'm worried about all sorts of things."
